BIO

I'm Alex Bloom, a multi-disciplinary designer & artist, proudly working in Carrboro, North Carolina. I've designed & built brand identities, websites, apps, and physical environments for grassroots initiatives and global enterprises. With every project, I strive for clarity, accessibility, utility, and fun.

Professional Philosophy

Remember the point, fear not to dream big, and don't overlook how it's all gonna work.
